response.overview: Produced by Nik Lee and Ellie Mullins, this official selection of the 2022 Boone Docs Film Festival offers expansive interviews covering the lives of six LGBTQ+ folks — all Appalachian and all “successful” in their own ways. As Long As You Can hopes to answer young LGBTQ+ Appalachians who are faced — every day — with the decision to leave or stay.
response.title: As Long As You Can
